title: Caveats of a China Trade Deal, Inequality in Healthcare
itunes:title: Caveats of a China Trade Deal, Inequality in Healthcare
description:
Bloomberg News Senior Trade Reporter Shawn Donnan discusses caveats of a China trade deal. Dr. Keshia Pollack Porter, Professor at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about inequality in healthcare. Seema Shah, Director of Consumer and Retail Trends at Creditntell, walks through turnaround challenges for Bed Bath & Beyond. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Annie Massa share their insight on the hidden dangers of the great index fund takeover. And we Drive to the Close with Alan Lancz, Research Director at LanczGlobal.com.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
